name: Hereafter (itch)
description:
Hereafter is a survival game in which you take control of a lonesome man and head out to gather supplies to survive. You will encounter multiple adversaries, whether they be enemies, starvation, dehydration or lack of rest. You will have to loot objects to find supplies in order to survive.

In the end game, whether you win or lose, you can upload your score to an online database and see whether or not you're in the top 10!

Available on Windows and Android now.

Disclaimer: This game was made in a little under three months. If there are any issues/bugs, please don't hesitate to contact me.

CREDITS

  • Code - Luke McMahon
  • Art - Andrew Larcombe
